q_en: Which cutting tasks have been completed by Master Cutters?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Master Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Master Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, order_product_id, produced_wip_id, planned_number, completed_number FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '3' AND status = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the completed cutting tasks for the working group "Master Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT op.id, o.order_name, p.attributes, pt.description FROM order_product op JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id IN (SELECT order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '3' AND status = 2);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product details for the completed cutting tasks

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.unit FROM materials m WHERE m.id IN (SELECT produced_wip_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '3' AND status = 2);
steps.description: Retrieve the produced WIP material details for the completed cutting tasks

response:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Order Name  | Product Attributes | Product Description | Planned Number | Completed Number | Produced WIP Material | Unit   |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-------------|--------------------|---------------------|----------------|------------------|-----------------------|--------|
| 3       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-19       | PolyU_Tshirt| Blue, L size       | T-shirt             | 150            | 150              | Fabric Pieces         | pieces |

The "Master Cutters" have successfully completed a task involving the production of 150 T-shirts, all in the lovely blue color and large size. The material used was "Fabric Pieces," and they did a fantastic job completing the task as planned! ğŸ‰
